text:
Hi folks,
please point me to the right direction.
I've created a custom button module. It has 4 types and 3 sizes of the button, plus icon settings.

How can I reuse this setup in other modules which must have a button inside?

Yes, but definitely there is a way around. Which I have already figured out.

1. hubl file is reused with a help of macros.
2. js and css move to global files or to hubl macro.
3. fields.json is reused with help of <https://github.com/iGoMoon/HubSpot-tools/tree/main/packages/HubSpot-fields-js>
